hotels.title: Luxury Iwate Mountain Spa Resort Retreat
hotels.description: Escape to ANA InterContinental Appi Kogen Resort and IHG Hotel for an indulgent mountain retreat merging breathtaking vistas with luxurious relaxation. Experience refined Japanese and French cuisine at Shiratsuyu restaurant, melt the stress away by sinking into the onsen baths or pamper yourself with a treatment at Lavilla Spa Appi. Strike out to explore Iwate's natural splendour and discover stunning landscapes that transform from winter white into vibrant verdant vistas in spring.

hotels.title: Japan Iwate Mountain Spa Resort with Fine Dining
hotels.description: Indulgence awaits at ANA Crowne Plaza Resort Appi Kogen, an IHG Hotel, a soothing mountain retreat delivering breathtaking vistas and direct access to the slopes. Devour a global menu of cuisines at the numerous restaurants onsite or relax with a calming cup of tea while enjoying highland views from the terrace cafe. With scorching onsen baths, golfing, hiking and Iwate's natural splendour at your fingertips, this resort offers an idyllic escape all year round.
